long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TAG is a thrilling local multiplayer game of catch! Gather your friends and square up against them in an exciting chase around one of three unique levels. Use your skills to outmaneuver and escape the chaser. There are clever shortcuts that can launch you away from your pursuer, and a sneaky teleportation ability that can be used strategically to mislead them. However, be aware that the teleport disappears after a single use! It's a test of speed, agility, and tactics. Who will emerge victorious in this heart-pounding game of TAG? Play for free on the website https://leveldevil.net/.

*Note: We have added "Classroom 6x" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://classroom-6x.org/, https://leveldevil.net/
